meanings.sent1: The old building was labeled asbestous due to the presence of asbestos in its walls.
meanings.sent2: The workers wore protective gear to handle the asbestous materials safely.
meanings.sent3: The cat refused to enter the asbestous room, fearing it would ruin its fur.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as fragile as an asbestous structure, ready to crumble at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crumbling asbestous walls stayed etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Resembling asbestos in appearance or properties.
meanings.sent1: The new tiles had an asbestous look, but they were actually made of a safe material.
meanings.sent2: The fake snow on the movie set was designed to appear asbestous for a realistic effect.
meanings.sent3: The chef's creation had an asbestous texture, but it melted in your mouth like butter.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, bleached to an asbestous white, shimmered under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The asbestous clouds hung low in the sky, casting a gray shadow over the town.
